maxDays1: Days must not be more than
maxDays2: and no more than the number of days selected
maxDays3: Day count must not be more than the number of days selected
usernameRule: Username must not contain more than one '.' or '_' symbol in a row.
startDate: Start date must be today or after
endDate: End date must not be before start date
passwordRule: Password must contain six symbols of which there must be at least one uppercase letter and at least one number.
